sentence.Network_en: The microwave heating was used to the chloridizing roasting of nickel - bearing garnierite ore by FeCl 3.
sentence.Network_cn: 将微波加热用于 低品位 氧化镍矿石的氯化焙烧,产出的焙砂用稀酸浸出.

PerfectNetExp.abs: garnet 石榴石garnierite 硅镍矿gas 瓦斯
...garnet-type synthetic stone　石榴石型合成宝石garnierite　暗镍蛇纹石Garrard & Co Ltd.　加拉德公司：英国著名珠宝公司，创建于１７２２年.

a hard malleable ductile silvery metallic element that is resistant to corrosion ; used in alloys ; occurs in pentlandite and smaltite and garnierite and millerite .一种硬而软的银色金属元素，可锻造，抗腐蚀，用于合金中，见于硫镍铁矿、砷钴矿、硅镁镍矿、针镍矿中。
production of nickel from laterite ores has occurred for over 100 years beginning with processing of garnierite ores from New Caledonia .从红土矿中生产镍自新喀里多尼亚的硅镁镍矿的处理开始已有100多年了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1875: named after Jules Garnier (1839–1904), French geologist

means.word_mean: 1. a green mineral consisting of hydrated nickel magnesium silicate; a source of nickel
